439
March 15th 5
Lt. Robert Purdy
Bradfordsville, Ky
Sir
Yours of the 15th ultimo To the Governor has been referred to this Office for answer.
It is not deemed advisable to increase the number of the State troops already in the field.

Very Respectfully
D, W, Lindsey
Adjutant Gen of Ky
